items.sentence: We\'re going to my folks\' for Christmas this year.
Two men are checking on what\'s wrong with the car.
We\'ve got to do something about this problem soon.
Common sense tells me this isn\'t the way to do it.
I don\'t think Tom will do what we asked him to do.
Revolutions that don\'t succeed are soon forgotten.
She couldn\'t convince him to write a song for her.
Empty your pockets and put everything on the table.
Don\'t blame them for what happened back in Boston.
You\'re the best thing that\'s ever happened to me.
